cleaned_text: LIMITED 30 Capsule(s) in Strip MRP 181.00 153.8515% OFF Inclusive of all taxes 30 days return policy [Read More](/legal/terms-and-conditions#returns) All the Products are packed and stored Safely Autrin Strip Of 30 Capsules Description Autrin capsule contains a combination of vitamin B9 (folic acid), vitamin B12 and iron, the essential nutrients that the body requires for optimal health. It is a nutritional supplement containing mu ltivitamins and iron. This supplement helps to improve the immunity, oxygen supply to muscles, energy levels, overall health and well-being of an individual. Autrin capsule is used mainly for iron deficiency anaemia, vitamin B deficiency and other relevant conditions. These deficiencies occur primarily due to illness, pregnancy, poor nutrition, digestive disorders, and many other conditions. Product Cynocobalamin / Methylcobalamin(15.0 Mcg) + Ferrous Fumarate(300.0 Mg)| Check more medicines with composition as Vitamin B9 / Folic Acid / Folate(1.5 Mg) + Vitamin B12 Mecobalamin / Cynocobalamin / Methylcobalamin(15.0 Mcg) + Ferrous Fumarate(300.0 Mg) Uses of Autrin Strip Of 30 Capsules - For treatment and prevention of different forms of anaemia. - For preventing iron, folic acid, and vitamin B12 deficiencies during pregnancy, breastfeeding, after surgery or in conditions of nutritional malabsorption. - As a dietary supplement. Precautions and Warnings of Autrin Strip Of 30 Capsules Other General Warnings Talk to your doctor if - You have any existing medical condition like diabetes, hypertension, kidney or liver problem. - You are on other medications, supplements or following any complementary or integrative health approaches. - You should not take this supplement if you are allergic to any of the components of this supplement. - You have any planned surgery or operation. You may be asked to stop taking these products at least 2-3 weeks ahead of the procedure. - Dietary supplements are intended to supplement the diets of some people and should not be a substitute for a well-balanced, varied diet and a healthy lifestyle. Ingredients and Benefits of Autrin Strip Of 30 Capsules - Autrin capsule contains vitamin B9 (folic acid), vitamin B12 and iron. - Vitamin B9 or Folic Acid: One of the essential vitamins which play a vital role in DNA and synthesis of amino acids. It is crucial for cell division and the development of blood cells. It is essential for the development of the brain and spinal cord of a growing baby and lack of this during pregnancy can lead to birth defects.... - Vitamin B12: It is essential for the functioning of the brain and nerves for the production of red blood cells and DNA synthesis. It also plays a major role in protein and fat metabolism, fertility, the functioning of hormones. It exists in different forms like Cyanocobalamin, Methylcobalamin and Adenosylcobalamin.... - Iron: It is a vital mineral body requires. It is crucial for haemoglobin (Hb) formation (present in red blood cells). Hb carries oxygen from the lungs to the entire body. It is also part of myoglobin that supplies oxygen to muscles. It plays a significant role in immunity, the formation of certain hormones and regulating body temperature.... Directions for Use of Autrin Strip Of 30 Capsules - Take Autrin capsule as advised by your doctor. - You should not consume vitamin & mineral supplements more than the stated recommended daily dose. - Avoid taking it with tea or coffee. Storage and disposal of Autrin Strip Of 30 Capsules - Autrin capsules should be stored in a cool and dry place. - Keep it out of the reach of children and pets. Content Details WRITTEN BY Dr. Mansi Savla B. Pharm, PharmD REVIEWED BY (Pharmacology) Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q: What food is rich in folic acid, iron & vitamin B12? - Meat, seafood, green leafy vegetables like spinach, nuts, beans, peas, orange, resins, etc are rich in folic acid, iron, and vitamin B12. - Vitamin B12 is naturally found in animal products like fish, meat, poultry, eggs, milk and milk products. Q: Does Autrin capsule interact with other medicines? - Medicines treat indigestion like antacids, medicines used to treat bacterial infections like chloramphenicol and medicines used to treat bone problems like bisphosphonates should be taken with a minimum gap of two hours.... - Consult your doctor if you are taking medicines like phenytoin (used to treat epilepsy), methotrexate (used to treat cancer), sulfasalazine (used to treat ulcers), water pill, metformin, omeprazole and cimetidine.... Q: Can I take Autrin capsule during pregnancy? A: Autrin capsules should be taken under medical supervision by a pregnant woman. This supplement is necessary for the overall development of the foetus and well being of pregnant women. High dose consumption of this supplement may be harmful. Thus, it is recommended to take this supplement as prescribed by your doctor. Q: When should I take Autrin cap? A: Autrin capsules should preferably be taken after meals or exactly as suggested by the doctor. Also, try to take it regularly, without skipping the dose to get maximum results. Taking the supplement regularly at the right times increases its effectiveness. Q: How long can cap Autrin be taken? A: You should take Autrin capsule regularly for effective results. The ideal duration and frequency of taking this supplement vary among individuals and are decided by your doctor. Take it until your doctor tells you to take it. Q: Does Autrin medicine cause constipation? A: Yes, Autrin can cause constipation sometimes, as a side effect. If it persists for long, speak to your doctor. The doctor might advise you of some stool softener as well along with this supplement. References View All [Office of Dietary Supplements - Folate [Internet]. Ods.od.nih.gov.
